oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Small scale growing of cotton in Memphis, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This photograph shows two men with a mule and a plow. One man is wearing a suit, the other man is wearing work clothes, he is likely a sharecropper. A large farm operation appears in the background.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cotton; Cotton farmers
Mules; Plows; Agriculture; Farming
